definition: to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
sonata form (one of the large-scale structures used in Western classical music)

sentences.english: He played a piano sonata of his own composition.
sentences.chinese: 他弹奏了一首自作的钢琴奏鸣曲。

sentences.english: The life of Shubert has altogether created more than 20 piano sonatas.
sentences.chinese: 舒伯特一生共创作了二十多首钢琴奏鸣曲。

sentences.english: Beethoven Sonata for Piano and Violin No. 4,5,9
sentences.chinese: 贝多芬第4，5，9号钢琴与小提琴奏鸣曲。

sentences.english: To the melody of Moonlight Sonata of Beethoven.
sentences.chinese: 到贝多芬《月光奏鸣曲》旋律畅想。

sentences.english: This thesis studies this sonata for two pianofortes in the way of performance.
sentences.chinese: 本文是从演奏的角度来系统研究这首双钢琴奏鸣曲的。

sentences.english: And Damisch chose Beethoven's A. N. S Appassionato Sonata for his a reason.
sentences.chinese: 达弥施选用了贝多芬的《热情奏鸣曲》只有一个理由。

sentences.english: Sonata No. 31 in A-flat Major for Piano, Op. 110
sentences.chinese: 第三十一号钢琴奏鸣曲，升A大调，作品110。

sentences.english: I remember hearing Yo-Yo Ma play the Bach sonatas for cello and keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 我记得我听过马友友拉的巴赫大提琴与键盘奏鸣曲。

sentences.english: He also wrote three piano sonatas, choral music, and more than 250 lieder .
sentences.chinese: 他还写了三首钢琴奏鸣曲和近两百五十首民谣歌曲。

sentences.english: Was this the same Beethoven to whose sonata I had done such violence?
sentences.chinese: 如此的暴力和我所弹过的奏鸣曲会是同一个贝多芬吗？

sentences.english: Sonata moonlight is the great composer, Beethovens masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 《月光奏鸣曲》是伟大作曲家贝多芬的名作。

sentences.english: The programme includes two Mozart sonatas.
sentences.chinese: 节目单中有两首莫扎特的奏鸣曲。

sentences.english: Sonata for cello &piano No. 5 in D major, Op.
sentences.chinese: 奏鸣曲大提琴及钢琴第5号在D大，作品。

sentences.english: His Sonatine for Flute and Piano is one of his best-known works.
sentences.chinese: 他为长笛与钢琴所写的小奏鸣曲，是他最著名的作品。

sentences.english: Damisch chose Beethoven's Appassionato Sonata for a reason.
sentences.chinese: 马克选择贝多芬的热情的奏鸣曲是有原因的。

sentences.english: Sonata in D major for 2 Pianos, KV. 448
sentences.chinese: 大调双钢琴奏鸣曲，作品448号，第一乐章。

definition: sonata form (one of the large-scale structures used in Western classical music)
